title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.196 - Living trust funds
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.196 - Living trust funds

State Regulations

Funds acquired by an institution subject to agreement
whereby resources are made available to the institution on condition that the
institution pay periodically to a designated person, or persons, the income
earned on the resources acquired for the lifetime of the designated person or
persons, or for a specified period. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.196

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
